description: The design features a tranquil ocean theme with a deep blue color palette, creating a soothing and immersive visual experience. The gradient background mimics ocean depths, complemented by images of fish and a clear sky with clouds. The typography is clean and modern, with white and orange text that stands out against the blue background, maintaining readability. The layout is well-structured, guiding the viewer's attention systematically from top to bottom, while the sidebar lists additional navigation options.
